price: 101. Bakotikalaka libela o kati na yango, mpe bakozuaka mabe o mokolo mona.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهِۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ حِمۡلٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhi wasāa lahum yawma al-qiyāmati ḥim'lan
